A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars of the franchise. Lots of sequences should be removed and used to develop the characters instead. Disappointing on every count - the pacing is off\, comedic scene throw off the ambiance\, lacking in epic moments with Luke\, Snoke  (absent). Was waiting for an epic battle that never came. They left us with many questions unanswered wich all and all give me the feeling of a waste movie. Sad\, just sad.
